title: Launcher not working right RIOT pls read
body:
So .. when patch 7.19 went online on EUNE me and my friends were playing and we were experiencing lag and the client being bugged and not working for hours .. me and my friends thought that it will be better the day after but it wasnt .. the 3. day (Thats today) i started a game and mid game my game froze and was not working i could not do anything so i turned off my PC with the power button and rebooted is straight away .. but when i launched League to get back into the game so i dont get low priority the client was not in my language .. and it was reinstalling the game. I made this discussion to maybe see if other players are having these lag problems also and to maybe get a answer from rito ..

PS: Excuse my bad english

replies.body: It sounds like your game files might have corrupted and attempted to repair.  If this is still an issue, try using our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to reinstall these bad game files.  Let me know if that helps or if you run into any issues.
